tetracycline 四环素tetrachord 四弦乐器tetrode 四极管
前缀tetra-也表示"四",来自希腊文。tetrachloride,四氯化物;tetrachord,四度音阶;tetradactyl,四趾的;tetrahedron,四面体;tetralogy,四部曲;tetrapod,四脚体;tetrarch.

what she sang was little bit difference with what Hai Xi Xi sang yesterday , the undulate of melody little , end sound was close to tetrachord and hexachord .她今天唱的和海喜喜昨天唱的又有所不同。旋律起伏较小，尾部结束音向上作纯四度和大六度滑近。
